channel.title: BioJulia on BioJulia
channel.description: Recent content in BioJulia on BioJulia

item.title: BioSequences
item.description:
Description

BioSequences provides data types and methods for common operations with biological sequences, including DNA, RNA, and amino acid sequences.

Features include:

  • DNA, RNA, and Amino Acid sequence types.
  • Kmer and Skipmer sequence types.
  • Methods for sequence transformations.
  • Methods for motif searching.
  • Mismatch and gc counting.

item.title: BioSymbols
item.description:
Description

BioSymbols defines the primitive type for nucleic acids and amino acids that are used for many other packages in the BioJulia software ecosystem.

Features include:

  • DNA, RNA, and Amino Acid sequence types.
  • Constants for the DNA, RNA, and AA symbols e.g. DNA_A, DNA_C, DNA_G, & DNA_T.
